alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Brevard, southeastern Orange and northeastern Osceola Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Haulover Canal to near Christmas to 8 miles west of Lone Cabbage Fish Camp to 6 miles southwest of Holopaw. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Rockledge, Cocoa, Wedgefield, and Lone Cabbage Fish Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
